choices: Your character (Will rename with character's name)
1.content:
-Salex, just escaped from the organization, 15, Nobody, Day's Nobody
-Alex, Day's best friend, controlled by Heartless
-Aldex, Night's Nobody, escaped with Salex, but got captured and brainwased, with organization XII as number XV
-Other, add your character
-More, more characters
1.title: Who is this following?

11.content: A hooded figure ran down the streats of Twilight Town. As he ran, a group of shadows appeared. The figure swiftly summoned two keyblades and took them out. Eventually he runns into someone, who?
11.title: Salex's run

choices: He summons his own Keyblades and gets ready to fight.
112.content: As the hooded figure ran and fought his way through the Heartless, he didn’t realise he was on a collision course with another, similar Nobody. As he rounded a corner, he ran into a young boy also wearing the same robes as him and with blonde spiky hair. He gasped in shock and then assumed a fighting position. “I found you!” he yelled as he summoned a Keyblade, this one being the Kingdom Key. The hooded figure considered his options, eventually coming to a conclusion.
112.title: Keyblade Wielders Cross Paths

choices: A wall of flame stops the two in their tracks.
1122.content:
The hooded figure didn’t have time for this. Fighting this young Nobody wasn’t his goal, it was to escape the evil reaches of Organization 13. To do that, he needed to get away from Twilight Town somehow. Besides, he had seen this kid before, when Xemnas had tried to force him into his ranks like he had Aldex..... He was looking on with confusion, clearly too innocent for his own good. Likely, Xemnas had sent him to capture him.

That wasn’t going to happen. Spinning on his heel, he proceed to dash off in the opposite direction both to where he had came from and from the blond Nobody. The kid was stunned for a second as he quickly realised what happened. “Hey, Wait! Come back here!” He unsummoned his Keyblade and dashed after the hooded figure.

A game of Tag(of sorts) had begun. For the next ten or so minutes, the two Nobodies chased each other across and around Twilight Town, only stopping when Heartless attacked. The kid was no closer to catching the hooded figure, but the reverse was true as well; he couldn’t shake him. But this soon changed.
1122.title: Catch Me If You Can

12.content: Alex walked through a door, and saw Traverse Town. "Hm, let's see..." He said to himself. Alex had been possesed by the heartless, and was now fighting for redemption. All around him, Heartless appeared. "So, that's how you want to play?" Alex said as he held up Wicked Heart, his blade.
12.title: Alex, the lost warrior

13.content: A hooded figure waited patiently in the lobby of the Castle That Never Was. Number 15 was a new addition to the ranks of Org. 13, much like Xion and Roxas. Eventually, he was approached by someone, who?
13.title: Aldex’s briefing

choices: Your Character (rename chapter to your OCs name)
15.content:
-Day, Salex’s somebody, Wielder of the Sola Ultima, a set of Sun* element gear.
-Night, Aldex’s somebody, Wielder of the Luna Ultima, a set of Moon element gear.
-Terra....or more specifically, The Lingering Will(Terra’s armor and Keyblade controlled by his desires...specifically to get his body back and beat Xenahort) and his heart(what makes Terra....well, Terra).
-Other, add your character
-More, add MORE characters
15.title: Other characters

info.brief_description: Salex is on the run from the organization, who to trust. Other characters stories allowed!
info.description: This takes place during 358/2 days, starting on day 99, so if anyone say "Where's Sora?" here's my answer: He's already assleap, CoM ends around day 69 is my guess. Now, this is a story you can add your own characters to. I will write Salex mainly, but if you do well, I may add to a different character.
